Diacute amplifies the effect of the next spell you cast.
The effect wears off only once.
Magical effects that are amplified are simple effect sizes, such as Fire
Amount of damageIn addition to those with
Some extend the duration of the turn, like the shield.
In that case, regardless of the number of turns remaining that are currently granted.
Be aware that the number of turns will be overwritten.
Also, magic that does not benefit from diacute
Magic with no effect amount or duration turnwhat?
There is no problem with using it while diacute is being granted.
Diacute can be layered up to four times.
The effect increases with the number of times the layer is applied.
Healing, Fire, etc., which have an effect amount are
Twice for one, three times for two..Twice, three times, four times..sevenfold
You can get seven times the effect in four times.
Shields, Reveal, etc., which can extend the effect, are
Five turns for zero, ten turns for one, fifteen turns for two.
Three times to grant 20 turns, four times to override the effect for 30 turns.

I know what's going on, Arl.
But you're really something, aren't you?
I don't think the girl has any menueki.
If you want to be friends with Aruru.
First of all, you have to think about them and make sure they're clean.
I'm not going to lecture you.
Come here. I'll give you a shower.

Hmm, I wonder if you're used to the opposite sex too.

You may think you're used to trouble, but you're not.
You never know when a relationship will turn sour.
You're so cute, Aruru. Get a grip.
Me?I'm not cute. I'm not cute.
I asked a friend of mine to give me a second-hand change of clothes.
My hair was long, but I cut it off.
I can't believe you did that for me.

Cut also said he's a training ground for new recruits, so he'll take the free stuff.
I'll take care of things in this town.
Whatever you want to talk about, just talk about it.
Anything about me, anything I don't know.
I have an apple pie that I baked...
I'm not very good. Do you want some?
I started crying and devouring Arle's apple pie.
To my own one-sided feelings for Aruru.
Aruru must have worked very hard on it.
It was as if it was a reflection of Arles itself.
Apple pie that is still unripe and a little sour...
The man's cursed heart was lifted by her good health.
The man began to talk about himself, in bits and pieces.
Ever since I first saw Arles in this town.
It was love at first sight, and he...
I followed Aruru again and again.
He'd been watching from the shadows during the adventure.
Every time Aruru was in a pinch, I tried to help him.
His legs were shaking and he said it was impossible.
I'm a man, and I feel so ashamed of myself...
But even if I ignore my complex.
The sneaky thought of getting close to Aruru always flickered in my mind.
I've become a cool and strong mage, and Aruru has confessed to me.
She kidnaps Aruru, who is full of energy, and does whatever she wants in her room...
My fantasies were always irresponsible and lonely.
Every time a man confesses something, and even if he doesn't, he soon does.
I had a habit of saying, I'm sorry.
You don't have to apologize. I'm telling you...
To fall in love with someone you don't know at all.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
Can I ask you your name?
I'm not sure I like you yet.
If you change, maybe I'll change, too.
I'm trying to become a mage.
I'm trying to help a lot of people in need...
So, even if the man of my dreams comes into my life.
I may not have time to worry about that.
It might be a little unfair, but...
If you're trying to do something...
I've fallen in love with other people during that time.
Because I don't think I did.
I want you to feel at ease, and I want you to work hard at something.
Maybe I'll change my mind then.
Haha, maybe you've changed too much.
You might lose interest in a little girl like me.
I want to be a strong man...
I don't know what the future holds, either.
I'm a mage. I know it's a long shot.
But the people who aspired to be, the people who became mages...
We all thought there was no way I could be one from the start.
I didn't set my own limits, and I worked hard to achieve them all the time.
I've heard that you can do it.
I have a lot of studying to do.
There are a lot of scary demons out there that I don't know about.
The future is like a bottomless dungeon.
It's pitch black. I can't see a thing.
But for me, it's what I don't know that excites me!
If there was an end, I wouldn't be aiming for it in the first place!
When a human being is first born, he or she is a gibberish.
I think it's because I wanted to preserve this excitement.
But after all, it's lonely to be alone.
I think it's very reassuring to have a friend who is aiming for the same thing.
Maybe I'll try harder to keep up!
I knew it was Aruru who liked her.
I'm an apprentice mage working on the same thing...
What have I been doing all this time, I...
Even though the distance between me and Aruru is getting closer.
I don't need to be a mage...
Something close to a mage, I...
I'm starting to feel like I can't stay.
Are you sure you want to do this?
I don't know anything about you yet.
If I see you again, we'll talk a lot.
If I wanted to stand in the same place as Aruru...
I'm so empty right now, I don't even care.
I hope we can meet and talk again.
I wish I had something more clever to say, but...
Morgus, who worked hard at his studies, became a knight with a mage.
It wasn't until a few years later that he appeared in front of Arles.
Morgus already had a mate, a mage.
She was an energetic girl, much like Aruru.
She was blessed with friends, but Aruru and I became particularly close.
They even taught each other how to study.
Every time Morgus finished a big job, he contributed to his own expedition.
Go to Juki's Tavern with the mysterious hooded man.

Hmm... I wonder if there was a better way.

The Piercing Demon prevents dangerous swallowing and restraint attacks.
Special attacks after Chapter 3 will no longer have any effect.
If you want even more protection, you can use the Earrings of Demon.+We'll need to modify it.
A rare sighting of bloated rotifers in recent yearsin a bad bookThe Mere Old Man.
The ecology has changed from the original one, making it more dangerous.
Originally, rotifers entered the body through the human mouth and became a parasite.
The bloated sludge worm spits out the sludge it has accumulated in its body.
After weakening its prey, it immediately attempts to swallow the prey whole.
After swallowing their prey whole, they suffocate them to death while sucking up their bodily fluids and magical power.
Having no digestive system, the rotifers spit out their prey.
This report is based on the remains of an adventurer whose cause of death has been determined.
It also turns out that you can't take the same precautions as swallowing a worm whole, etc.
